casebody.data:
In the INTEREST OF: S.N. and N. N. By Their Next Friend, Ryan Nolen and Ryan Nolen, Individually, Appellant,
v.
Danielle Maria SMITH, Respondent. WD 81905 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: April 2, 2019 Lindsey Van Fleet, Independence, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Danielle Smith, Independence, MO, Respondent Acting Pro Se. Before Division Four: Karen King Mitchell, Chief Judge Presiding, Alok Ahuja, and Thomas N. Chapman, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Ryan Nolen (Father) appeals from the judgment of the Circuit Court of Jackson County, which awarded the parties joint legal and physical custody. Father challenges on appeal the designation of the address of Danielle Smith (Mother) as the address of the parties' minor children for mailing and educational purposes, the division of parenting time, and the modification of Father's support obligation. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
